doc.title: La fuga di Rosania
doc.plot: Italy, 1240 a.D. Young Rosania flees home to reach her youthful lover. The road is exceedingly long and difficult though, and the two kids cannot meet. She is found and taken back to her father's castle, after spending the night among the wild mountains. Her father loves her in a possessive way, and sends a man to kill the boy.
